descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD! BEAST, MALE, FEMALE, ORC, MER SUPPORT! WEIGHT SLIDER DOESN\'T WORK YET!

Okay, I\'ve been working on this set of gear for mid-to-long time.
I\'ve had numerous issues during the creation process, and that is going to explain most of the bugs you might encounter. 
Thus I really hope you backup your save. Even if it\'s just a piece of armor.

What this mod does?
Adds craftable items TO SKYFORGE. NO OTHER REQUIREMENTS. NOTE! ARMOR PARTS ARE UNDER MISC SECTION, HAND AND BOOK UNDER JEWELRY
The items:
Oblivionwalker Hood (Horned hood)
Oblivionwalker Helmet (Recolored Glass helmet, looks a bit similar to Lich helmet from oblivion)
Oblivionwalker Robes 
Oblivionwalker Gloves (Bandages)
Oblivionwalker boots (Mix\'n\'matched set of boots)
Destructonomicon Wearable book, grants you invisibility and muffle on sneak, increases magic resistance by 10%, damages health and stamina regeneration rate by 75% AND gives you the spellbreaker effect while blocking
Helping hand Wearable hand in a quiver on your back. Fortify conjuration by 10%, increases the potent of conjuration spells by 20% (Length), and increases magic resistance by 15%

This supports both, male and female, human, mer and beast. (Didn\'t test orc though but it should work)

Stats suck now.
I know it, you don\'t have to say it.
What I do want you to say is better idea for the stats.

BUGS:
Eh, there might be many, there might be none.
I had to pack this mod manually because creation kit started to talk to me about bsshader bug, and I haven\'t yet been able to figure out why it\'s acting like that.
WEIGHT SLIDER IS NOT WORKING!
I had made the male and female _1 versions, but when I tested them in-game, they went full retard when I equipped them.
However, as this requires Dawnguard you are able to walk into Ragged Flagon and change your apparance, thus your weight too.
author: Shadowjin
